text:
Life is an album by Culture Club. It was released in 2018. It was their sixth album together (apart from two Greatest Hits albums.)
'God and Love' 'Human Zoo', 'Let Somebody Love You', 'What Does Sorry Mean?', 'Runaway Train', 'Resting Bitch Face', 'Different Man', 'Oil and Water', 'More than Silence', and 'Life'
